misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry with distinction. He has participated in 7 past events and secured the coveted Hector Trophée title twice, marking him as a formidable competitor in the pair format.
Despite not having claimed the Victor Trophy for individual excellence, Daniel's consistent performance and strategic play make him a respected opponent on the course.
Known for his occasional flashes of temper, Daniel is, at heart, a true gentleman of the game. He embodies the spirit of sportsmanship and camaraderie that defines the Hector Trophée.

While Daniel is not currently slated to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, golf enthusiasts know that last-minute changes are always a possibility, and his presence would undoubtedly enrich the competition.
